member.summary: Causes the gridview to enter editing mode for the current cell and current row, unless the gridview is already in editing mode.
member.returns: true if the gridview enters editing mode; otherwise, false.

member.returns: true if the gridview enters editing mode; otherwise, false.
member.param: Provides information about the keyboard or mouse gesture that prompted the method call. Can be null.

member.name: M:Intersoft.Client.UI.Data.UXGridView.CancelEdit
member.summary: Causes the gridview to cancel the current edit, restore the original value, and exit editing mode.
member.returns: true if the cancellation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Intersoft.Client.UI.Data.UXGridView.CancelEdit(Intersoft.Client.UI.Data.EditingUnit)
member.summary: Causes the gridview to cancel the current edit, restore the original value, and exit editing mode.
member.returns: true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.
member.param: Specifies whether to cancel editing for a Row or Cell.

member.name: M:Intersoft.Client.UI.Data.UXGridView.CommitEdit
member.summary: Causes the gridview to commit the current edit to the data source and exit editing mode.
member.returns: true if the edit was commit successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Intersoft.Client.UI.Data.UXGridView.CommitEdit(Intersoft.Client.UI.Data.EditingUnit,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Causes the gridview to commit the current edit to the data source, and optionally exit editing mode.
member.returns: true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.
member.param: Specifies whether to commit the edit for a Row or Cell.
true to exit editing mode; otherwise, false.
